title: Math-Physics Paris
text: Supervised by Juven Wang, the Math-Physics Paris Seminar focuses on symmetries in modern physics, exploring their fundamental roles and recent developments across CMT, HEP and mathematical physics. This seminar aligns with the theme of the 2024 IHES Summer School.
